content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for assistance with HVAC, plumbing, or electrical work?
Yeah, uh, my AC isn’t working right. Keeps making some noise, then nothing. Not sure what I need. Can you fix this? Or do I need someone else? I don’t really know how this works.
Thank you for the information. We can definitely help with AC issues! May I have your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Isn’t this going to take forever? Last time I tried this with someone else, they never even showed up. Doesn’t anybody just answer the phone anymore?

I understand how frustrating that must have been! I promise we do our best to be reliable and quick. If you prefer to speak by phone, I can arrange a callback as well. Could you please tell me your name so I can assist you as quickly as possible?
Yeah, well, I want to know: how much is this going to cost before I have to give you anything else? Don’t want to get tricked again.

Thank you for asking! Prices can vary depending on the exact issue with your AC. Would you like a ballpark estimate, or would you prefer our technician visit first to diagnose it? An in-person visit gives you the most accurate quote.
You always say you'll have to come look. How does that help me? Last guy said that and charged a hundred bucks just to show up. This better not be like that.

Our service call fee is $80, which goes toward any repairs if you choose to move forward. There are no hidden costs, and we’ll explain everything upfront! Shall we go ahead and look at available times for a technician to visit?
I don’t know. I keep getting told different things. Why can’t you just tell me what’s wrong with it or give me the actual cost? And how do I know you’re going to show up? This is all too much.

I wish I could diagnose it remotely, but unforunately we really need to see the unit to give you an exact answer. I can promise we’ll give a clear estimate and only start work with your approval. If you’d like, I can check for our soonest available appointment?
No, I don’t want to waste more of my time if no one is going to help. Maybe I’ll just try somewhere else. I don’t know if this is even worth it.
